pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cron data structure and Attoparsec parser. The idea is to embed it in larger systems which want to roll their own scheduled tasks in a format that people are used to. 'System.Cron' is where all the interesting datatypes live. You will also find 'scheduleMatches', which you can use to compare a time against a 'CronSchedule' to see if an action needs to be performed. System.Cron.Parser is where you will find the parsers `cronSchedule`, `crontabEntry` and `cronTab`. To parse individual schedules up to full crontab files.
